title: How to start the introduction to write a persuasive letter to convince someone to attend my school - Quora

response.answer_text: Get right to the point: “I want to invite you to consider attending ZZZ Academy, rated among the best fly fishing schools in Kansas.” Then tell something about the school and why it is so highly rated. Then say why you picked this person to invite. Finally explain what they should do to consider enrolling and where to get more info about the school, tuition, fees, housing, etc.
